frontmatter.title: OpenLineage Support in Egeria
frontmatter.author: Mandy Chessel
frontmatter.description: The Egeria project uses OpenLineage to enhance its production of holistic metadata about an organization's operations.

frontmatter.title: Video - OpenLineage at Data Agility Day
frontmatter.author: Ross Turk
frontmatter.description: At Data Agility Day 2021, Julien Le Dem and Kevin Mellott outlined their approach to data lineage and discussed various approaches to implementing it in the real world.

frontmatter.title: Tracing Data Lineage with OpenLineage and Apache Spark
frontmatter.author: Michael Collado
frontmatter.description: Spark ushered in a brand new age of data democratization... and left us with a mess of hidden dependencies, stale datasets, and failed jobs.

frontmatter.title: How Northwestern Mutual Simplified Data Observability with OpenLineage & Marquez
frontmatter.author: Kevin Mellott
frontmatter.description: Northwestern Mutual is building an Enterprise Data Platform. In this guest blog, learn about the experiences and decisions that led them to embrace the OpenLineage and Marquez communities.

frontmatter.title: Using Marquez to Visualize dbt Models
frontmatter.author: Ross Turk
frontmatter.description: Each time dbt runs, it generates a trove of metadata about datasets and the work it performs with them. In this post, Iâ€™d like to show you how to harvest this metadata and put it to good use.

frontmatter.title: Introducing OpenLineage 0.1.0
frontmatter.author: Julien Le Dem
frontmatter.description: We are pleased to announce the initial release of OpenLineage. This release includes the core specification, data model, clients, and integrations with common data tools.

frontmatter.title: Expecting Great Quality with OpenLineage Facets
frontmatter.author: Michael Collado
frontmatter.description: Good data is paramount to making good decisions- but how can you trust the quality of your data and its dependencies?

frontmatter.title: Extending OpenLineage with Facets
frontmatter.author: Julien Le Dem
frontmatter.description: Facets are a self-contained definition of one aspect of a job, dataset, or run at the time the event happened. They make the OpenLineage model extensible.

frontmatter.title: OpenLineage joins the LF AI & Data Foundation
frontmatter.author: Julien Le Dem
frontmatter.description: Becoming a LF AI & Data project ensures that OpenLineage can never belong to a company, or even a group of developers; it belongs to us all.

frontmatter.title: Exploring Lineage History via the Marquez API
frontmatter.author: Michael Collado
frontmatter.description: Taking advantage of recent changes to the Marquez API, this post shows how to diagnose job failures and explore the impact of code changes on downstream dependents.
